figure_0003: Representative SEM micrograph of pottery samples (numbered 1.13 (A), 1.24 (B), 1.24 (C), and 1.35 (D)) from Guatemala showing particle size diameters at magnification 400X and 300X, Voltage applied =15 kV, 20 kV.

figure_0005: Representative TGA Representative TGA and derivative TGA (DTGA) curves of pottery sherd samples 1.17 (A), and 1.39 (B) acquired under a N2 atmosphere. The samples were heated at 20 °C/minute.
